mapper.sql: id, DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(genTime,'%Y-%m-%d %h') genTime, siteId, siteName, concentration, spanvalues, checkdata, itemName, itemId,unit, type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from zero_check
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into zero_check (id, genTime, siteId, siteName, concentration, spanvalues, checkdata, itemName, itemId, type,unit) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{genTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{concentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spanvalues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into zero_check
id,
genTime,
siteId,
siteName,
concentration,
spanvalues,
checkdata,
itemName,
itemId,
type,

mapper.update:
update zero_check
genTime = #{genTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
siteId = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
siteName = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
concentration = #{concentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spanvalues = #{spanvalues,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkdata = #{checkdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemName = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemId = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zero_check set genTime = #{genTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, siteId = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, siteName = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, concentration = #{concentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spanvalues = #{spanvalues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkdata = #{checkdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemName = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemId = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from zero_check where genTime like concat('%','${gtnTime}','%') and siteId=#{siteId} and type=#{type} and itemId=#{itemId}
SELECT * FROM `zero_check` WHERE `type` = #{type} AND siteId = #{siteId} AND genTime >= #{start} AND genTime <= #{end} ORDER BY genTime DESC
SELECT siteId,siteName FROM zero_check GROUP BY siteId,siteName
